entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:32 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h in the morning then light in the afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:32 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:32 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
